Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Commander Job W. Price, who is mentioned in the claim as being killed in the plane crash, had actually died by suicide in Afghanistan.

Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in the provided statement.
